text:
Hi all,

I am working on integrating HubSpot and Shopify but noticed the native HS built integration is missing custom fields and meta data. Does anyone have HS-SH integration experience and knows of an alternative that would also permit a 2 way sync.

I looked into the Unific integration and noted they only have a one way sync.

Any help is appreciated, thank you!
Hi Kevan, Not sure if this is relevant but you might want to have a look at Zapier for integration between HS and SH
